name: Customer_Outstanding_Surat
query:
select
 (cod.acc_mst_id) as Acc_mst_id
 ,(cor.name) "Id:Link/Customer_Outstanding_Reporting:100"
 ,cod.family_head as FamilyHead
 ,cod.acc_name as Cus_Name
 ,cod.mobileno1 as Mobi_1
 ,cod.mobileno2 as Mobi_2
 ,tbm.branch_short_name as Branch_Name
 ,(cod.cl_bal*-1) as Outstanding_Amt
 ,Date(cod.vouchar_dt) as VoucharDt
 ,cod.due_day as DueDays
 ,cod.sales_man_name as Salesman
 ,cod.reference as Reference
 ,cod.naration as Narration
 ,sum(case when osr.date < cod.vouchar_dt then 0 else 1 end)Total_followup 
 ,max(osr.date) as last_Followup
 ,datediff(max(osr.nxt_followup),CurDate())Rema_Followup_Days
FROM
    `tabCustomer_Outstanding_Data` cod
    left join `tabCustomer_Outstanding_Reporting` cor on cor.acc_mst_id = cod.acc_mst_id
    left join `tabOutstanding_Remarks` osr on osr.parent = cor.name
    left join `tabBranch_Master` tbm on tbm.branch_name =cod.branch_name 
    where cod.branch_name = 'SURAT BR.- SHAH VIRCHAND' 
group by cod.acc_mst_id
Order by Mobi_1
